about_the_game:
Prologue:

The female knight miraculously survives when her village is suddenly attacked by an orc army.

After her wounds heal and she recovers, she vows revenge and heads alone to where the orcs are.

Game Features:

This is a hardcore swordplay game with a strict rule that if you pause the game, your health state at that time is saved as is.

Game Objectives:

1. Defeat 25 or more marked enemies.

2. Find 25 or more hidden gems.

3. Successfully complete 20 or more quests.

4. Defeat the boss in the boss quest within the quest.

■Mark enemies.

When you defeat small goblins, you can obtain enemy data. Once you have obtained some of that data, mark a weak-looking enemy first and head to that enemy's location to defeat it.

■Defeat the stalker.

On the way to the marked enemy, there is a chance that you will encounter one red-bodied enemy called a "stalker."

Defeating a "Stalker" will give you a little more experience.

■Get Sword Gems.

The white gems on the field will give your sword one of the following statuses: "Normal", "Fire", "Electricity", or "Poison", and will slightly increase your attack power. Be proactive in getting them to give you an advantage in battle.

■Get keys and find hidden gems.

When you defeat a marked enemy and your revenge is complete, the enemy will drop a key. When you have the key and a treasure chest is nearby, a sound will let you know its location. Use that sound to find the treasure chest and get the hidden gem.

■You can only recover health by changing to a Heal Sword.

The only way to recover health in this game is to switch your sword to a Heal Sword and use it to damage enemies.

You fight while switching between a normal sword and a Heal Sword.

■Accept quests.

You can accept quests by pressing the view button. Quests have a time limit, and you can increase the number of successful quests by completing the objectives within that time.

*Please be aware that this game may cause problems if run on a computer with low specifications.

XBOX Controller:

Move:Left stick

Camera:Right stick

Attack:A button

Dodge:B button

Sword change:X button

Defense:LB button

Next target:RB button

Enemy data:D PAD LEFT

Status:D PAD RIGHT

Sword data:D PAD DOWN

Quest start:View button

Quit the game:Menu button

Lock on/off:Right stick push

Canvas on/off:Left stick push

Note) If the up and down movements of the right stick no longer work, you can fix this by slightly changing the stick settings in the options.

"Recording, streaming, Let's Play videos, and any similar activities related to this game are strictly prohibited. Please enjoy the game for personal use only. We do not handle exceptions or inquiries regarding this policy."
